answers.answer: When you feel stressed and anxious your body's immune system is compromised and because of this you can be prone to getting infections and skin conditions.Get checked out by the doctor if you experience new health problems.Some conditions can feel worse when you are stressed and anxious and suffer from depression.If you are experiencing any illness or have a skin problem, make an appointment to see your doctor.

I'm actually at this point right now. I hope that all of my skin issues (ex: rash, acne, bumps, and itching) is from stress or related to stress. I have anxiety, depression, adhd, ibs, ic, and endo and I do know that many of these symptoms, including stress, goes with all of these conditions. I have a doctor appt. today at 5pm, so we'll see what he says.

Hope you got to find some answers from your doctor's appointment today.The other point to note, is that all your symptoms will also be exacerbated by the stress and anxiety.  Have you tried relaxation and breathing techniques to help you to relax?  You do not need to answer that, it is just something for you to think about.With all the problems that you have, you will already know that a healthy and well balanced diet is imperative.  Sorry, but I do not know what "ic" stands for.  You will also have learned through experience that your Irritable Bowel Syndrome will also be triggered off by stressful situations.The rash and itching may be a bacterial or fungal problem, allergy or diabetes.   Hope your doctor has an answer and a remedy for you.Follow the advice of your doctor with regard to your diet so that you do have a healthy and well balanced intake of nutrition.  Keep a diary of everything you eat and drink so see if you can see a pattern that may be making your condition worse.  Cut out completely or reduce your consumption of sugary and processed foods, sweets and chocolate (dark chocolate in moderation is better than milk chocolate) and fizzy drinks.Drink more water.You may find that Evening Primrose may be helpful for your menstrual problems.Best wishes.
